Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/31st
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th near Lawndale/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th: due to street blockage near Lawndale/31st.

Southbound buses will operate via Central, 31st and Lawndale.

Northbound buses will operate via Central Park and 25th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays: following an earlier mechanical problem at Jackson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays: following an earlier mechanical problem at Jackson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
